about_the_game:
White Star Rising Battlepack 2

White Star Rising Battlepack 2 extends the conflict into the fall and winter 1944-45, and Allied forces fight to liberate occupied France from Germany. It's a titanic struggle that pits the advanced weaponry of the German Army against the airpower, artillery, and ever-improving soldiers of the Allies.


White Star Rising Battlepack 2 depicts platoon-level combat in World War II, where you'll find everything you're looking for in a platoon level game: armor, artillery, infantry serving as more than cannon fodder, command and control, air support, and desperate close assaults that leave the victor in possession of the ground and the defeated in headlong retreat. White Star Rising Battle Pack 2 includes 10 Scenarios focusing on the fighting between the Americans, their British allies, and Germans, Unit types include vehicles, soldiers, and weapons of the armies that fought in France, Belgium, and Germany in 1944-45. You'll fight battles at Omaha Beach, in the Lorraine, on the outskirts of Belgium, and in Germany itself.

White Star Rising Battlepack 2 Scenarios

The Final Breach
March 7th, 1945 Belgium

Drive through Chaumont
December 23rd, 1944 Belgium

A Rock and a Hard Place
December 18th, 1944 Belgium

Marve the Door to Bastogne
December 20th, 1944 Belgium

Roosevelt's Butchers
June 13th, 1944 France

From Minutes into Days
September 23rd, 1944 France

The Hill of Death
June 27th, 1944 France

Let's Get this Liberation Going
June 6th, 1944 France

The Duel
March 6th, 1945 Germany

A Bloody Meat Sandwich
September 7th, 1944 Netherlands

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: MacBook, MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, Mac Mini, iMac or Mac Pro on after 2010
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3072 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5 GHZ Processor or Equivalent (Running the game in higher resolution requires more processing power.)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3072 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution: 1024x768
